channel.title: immune response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in immune response on funPlantGenes

item.title: AhNPR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Arahy.R60CUW Gene Symbol: AhNPR3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhNPR3 regulates the expression of WRKY and PR genes, and mediates the immune response of the peanut.

item.title: BRHIS1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g08220 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0180300 Gene Symbol: BRHIS1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CaAIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ca12g04370 Gene Symbol: CaAIL1 Gene Name: AP2 transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaAIL1 Acts Positively in Pepper Immunity against Ralstonia solanacearum by Repressing Negative Regulators.

item.title: CaARF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana00g000236 Gene Symbol: CaARF9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that an auxin response factor, CaARF9, has dual roles in enhancing the immune resistance to Ralstonia solanacearum infection and in retarding plant growth by repressing the expression of its target genes as exemplified by Casmc4, CaLBD37, CaAPK1b and CaRROP1.

item.title: CaCKR5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA02g17820 Gene Symbol: CaCKR5 Gene Name: cysteine-rich receptor-like protein kinase Genome: cultivar CM334 genome Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A cysteine-rich receptor-like protein kinase CaCKR5 modulates immune response against Ralstonia solanacearum infection in pepper.

item.title: CaNDR1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaNDR1a Gene Name: Non-race specific Disease Resistance 1a Genome: Species: Coffea arabica Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterization of the Non-race specific Disease Resistance 1 (NDR1) orthologous protein in coffee.

item.title: CaNDR1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaNDR1b Gene Name: Non-race specific Disease Resistance 1b Genome: Species: Coffea arabica Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterization of the Non-race specific Disease Resistance 1 (NDR1) orthologous protein in coffee.

item.title: CmWRKY15-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmWRKY15-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Isolated CmWRKY6–1 from chrysanthemum ‘Jinba’ and identified it as a transcriptional repressor localized in the nucleus via subcellular localization and transcriptional activation assays.

item.title: CmWRKY6-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmWRKY6-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmWRKY6–1–CmWRKY15-like transcriptional cascade negatively regulates the resistance to fusarium oxysporum infection in Chrysanthemum morifolium.

item.title: GbNRX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbNRX1 Gene Name: nucleoredoxin 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: The Thioredoxin GbNRX1 Plays a Crucial Role in Homeostasis of Apoplastic Reactive Oxygen Species in Response to Verticillium dahliae Infection in Cotton.

item.title: GhMKK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_21502 Gene Symbol: GhMKK6 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase 6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Scaffold protein GhMORG1 enhances the resistance of cotton to Fusarium oxysporum by facilitating the GhMKK6-GhMPK4 cascade.

item.title: HvMPK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvMPK4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvMPK4 phosphorylates HvWRKY1 to enhance its suppression of barley immunity to powdery mildew fungus.
